title: When you warn your friend about saying something forbidden from Morde.

replies.body:
Good thing you censored his name.
He'd be dead and buried in a matter of minutes.

And raised again to do your bidding.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
Elementary, my dear Watson.
https://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/37517123.jpg

I've heard Sion already lost a leg! 
I bet all it needs is a little push... well, maybe three...
with a mace
{{champion:202}} Three...?
I wish I could learn the way of the Hue
Shall I put together some guide?
Actually, looking to get back into league, some tips and pointers for Morde would be good.

I'm sure many people would enjoy a guide from the boards Sexiest Mordekaiser.

Sorry, I'm still not over that picture of you. Like, goddamn man.
Yes, would be nice!
Yes please! Morde is the type of champ that I would love to play but have no idea how to go about doing it.
Yes, yes, and um.. Yes!

The Hway.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
especially since he doesn't know the greatest morde is from euw...
https://38.media.tumblr.com/b1ca6d36b380d6860f3cefb5500014f7/tumblr_inline_n4twusxBwv1qcdbhg.gif

I dislike mordekaiser as a champion due to his clunky feeling and slow ramp up to an unfun, if powerful lategame. He becomes close to unkillable, and I personalyl dislike draintanks and mid-combat healers for their frustrating, boring, slow, and antifun concept. {{champion:82}} is bad in my opinion.

Blasphemy!

His entire design revolves around being a Juggernaut, his playstyle being very close to let's say Darius' :P

But darius has a core item in phage, and has a fairly fun kit. In the time I mained darius (pre-juggernaut), he was fun. He had high damage, could get mobility, and felt like he was dragging people across lane and vi-ulting them. Now he feels similar to morde - stand in the middle of team, soak up damage, heal it back, kill someone maybe and yay you win. The concept is more similar to swain, however. Morde just has to stand in a team and cast a few abilities to do massive damage and heal it all up but he STILL feels like aurelion sol - you are doing something, it just doesn't feel like it!

You do know that "Fun" is highly subjective.
I find Mordekaiser to be the most fun champ there is in League while finding the most popular champions "boring" and unfun.

In the end it all comes down to personal preference.
True. This is, of course, only my opinions of juggernauts in general. :)

WAIT OH MY GOD WE BOTH HAVE THE SAME ICON 
* actually surprised
everyone who likes morde uses this icon....
But... WAIIIIITI am I the only one who got  it for my first penta?
I haven't gotten a penta yet. I did get Morde with the free rp, so I should thank Rito for doing something good... last year...
Is it bad if I have 26 pentas and im still bronze? Maybe i shoudl try to climb lol...
You are bronze and I am too afraid to play ranked. What a pair we make {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

WEll yeah lol.
I did my promos at the start when I had no idea what i was doing. I thought I could play OP champs instead of things i was good at lol. Since then ive been too afraid T_T

I like his concept, I just think it was done poorly even after the juggernaut update. The way his kit works currently and pre-juggernaut doesn't have any CC and isn't allowed to be strong because how unhealthy it would be. When I was newer to the game I ended up getting Morde as one my earliest champion because I thought his kit was insanely broken just from reading what it did. Then I acutally played the guy and became disappointed with how weak he was after playing multiple games on him. Those champion descriptions from the store need to be updated to included the descriptions from in game because if I could see their numbers I would never have gotten Aattrox or Morde.
*Pentakill icon actually. It seems i'm the only one who bought it after his first penta...
mord is a useless champ tho

There isn't a single champion that doesn't have any use in this game.
And Mordekaiser definitely isn't useless at all.

Yeah, everyone has damage but who needs proper hard CC and utility when you have a DRAGON? 
######_whoa wait, the dragon can slow enemies while burning them alive under their towers?! I was just joking around I mean I'm no Morde fanatic but jeez dood I'm already convinced_

But Zyra and Maokai are useless! Anyone can get ignite and just burn them down!

/s in case it wasn't obvious
u gon git rekt son

I find a lot of people just don't really know how to play him I think. I've seen a Mord top destroy an entire enemy team. I love having a good Mord on my team, it makes me feel safe. XD Since I usually play squishy champs, like Twitch. (Whom is my favorite adc.) It's nice to have a giant metal wall between you and the enemy. Don't get me wrong I've seen some absolutely horrible Mord players. I destroyed one top as Irelia not terribly long ago. (And I don't play Irelia but once in a blue moon so you can't say it's my skill that did it.) But really a good Mord is well worth the time it takes to learn him I think. 83
We can still find him, op.gg your name and find the game with a morde and slay the whole team. Im gonna get putch fork and torch kit.
How would op.gg help you if he wasn't in the game with his friend? His friend was complaining about a game, not one they played together.
Don't even play morde and I know to NEVER FUCK WITH MORDE MAINS! O_O
Then you've never tried calling my beautiful knifecat "broken". DON'T DO IT.
Y-yes, sir! O_O
We should run now...
Good idea.
http://giphy.com/gifs/justin-g-run-away-fast-3o7ZeEZUzRjyvWuuIg
And now I know why you dislike Juggernauts! haha^^
{{champion:86}}  "Welcome to hell kitten."

They have a weapon for you. Its called noxian guillotine.
{{champion:122}}

{{champion:78}}  Dive the adc, I dare you
{{champion:40}}  do it pussy! ...pussy cat*
